Title: Minor Security Breach
Description: A small security incident occurred due to your oversight.
Follow-up Text: "The breach was contained, but your superiors have noted the incident."

Title: Insurgent Propaganda
Description: Insurgent materials have been distributed in lower levels.
Follow-up Text: "Propaganda flyers were found in maintenance areas. Security has been increased."

Title: Contraband Smuggled
Description: Illegal goods have entered the base through your checkpoint.
Follow-up Text: "Black market activity has increased. Your supervisor is displeased."

Title: Loss of life
Description: An explosion onboard occurred due to your oversight.
Follow-up Text: "Troopers died. Your supervisor has been killed by the Order."
